args.title: Customer Loyalty Analysis Report
args.body:
Here is the analysis report for the customer loyalty of the YHJKL12345 product:

1. Renewal Data Summary
2. Churn Reasons Analysis
3. Marketing Campaign Effectiveness

Please find the attached file for detailed information.

origin_prompt.content: 我需要评估某款养老健康险产品的客户忠诚度。首先，获取该产品在过去一年内的续保数据。然后，分析续保数据中的客户流失原因。接着，获取该产品的市场推广效果数据。最后，提供基于客户忠诚度的改进建议。
